tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Gypsy Eyes
programme.desc: Unable to lose the pursuing Russian fighters, Harm's and Mac’s hijacked Mig is shot out of the sky over Siberia.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Act of Terror
programme.desc: When Arab terrorists attach a mine to a US Navy warship in an attempt to sink it, Marine guards are able to kill one and capture the other, even after the mine explodes, killing two sailors.(n)

programme.title: JAG: The Black Jet
programme.desc: Harm and Mac are sent to Teheran, Iran to represent a Navy flier whose Stealth jet crashed in Iran due to a major mechanical failure.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Silent Service
programme.desc: Mac and Harm are having trouble relating...a result of working together under stress for so long.(n)

programme.title: JAG: King of the Greenie Board
programme.desc: Harm is now a Tomcat division commander aboard the carrier USS Patrick Henry that is patrolling the Mediterranean near Yugoslavia.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Queen Scary
programme.desc: At Halloween, Team Scorpion takes on a case to prove the existence of ghosts on the Queen Mary but find an all-too-real disaster when they locate a 'ghost ship' on a deadly collision course.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Go With the Florence
programme.desc: While tracking a device that can prevent a nuclear meltdown through the Los Angeles sewers, Walter learns the nuances of listening and not offering advice to Paige.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Faire is Foul
programme.desc: For Sylvester's birthday, Team Scorpion visits a renaissance festival, but the revelry is cut short when a group tries to rob a nearby police evidence locker.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: It's Raining Men (Of War)
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Team Scorpion's new neighbor, Florence \, joins them at sea on a mission to destroy a floating island of trash, but her flawed contribution leaves her, Walter and Happy stranded on the quickly dissolving island.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Crime Every Mountain
programme.desc: As Cabe's trial looms over Team Scorpion, a simple case goes sideways when they help a father and his daughter whose plane crashes nearby.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.sub-title: Who Let the Dog Out ('Cause Now It's Stuck in a Cistern)
programme.desc: As Team Scorpion anxiously awaits the verdict of Cabe's trial which could send him to prison, they focus their nervous energy on trying to save a dog stuck in a cistern.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Breaking Up the Band
programme.desc: Now that Sam and Marlo’s baby girl has arrived (Ep. 520), it’s clear nothing could have prepared Andy for this moment. So when Juliet offers Andy an opportunity to leave town for 4 months on an undercover project, Andy starts to consider it.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: 74 Epiphanies
programme.desc: Andy and Sam’s wedding comes just in time for the gang to celebrate one last hurrah. But when Andy is taken off-course by a hitchhiker and then stranded on the side of a dead-end road with a dying man, she finds herself with no way to get help.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night’s traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: All by Her Selfie
programme.desc: Oliver gets promoted and Andy is tasked with training 15 Division’s newest rookie, Duncan Moore. But when Andy and Duncan respond to a messy homicide at a pawnshop, it’s clear this rookie is going to give Andy the challenge of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Heart Breakers, Money Makers
programme.desc: When Andy and Nick’s seizure at an illegal gambling house leads to a suspicious confession, Andy recruits Sam to help figure out who’s lying, why, and where the money is, before anyone gets hurt.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Chillingham Castle
programme.desc: Karl & Stuart take on one of the Most Haunted rooms in this ancient castle. Whatever is there, seems desperate to make itself known.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Doncaster Air Museum Pt1
programme.desc: The famous Air Museum in Doncaster houses many an artefact of aviation history and many spirit from its past. Karl investigates one of the huts that is said to be full of paranormal happenings, and he isn’t disappointed.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Doncaster Air Museum Pt2
programme.desc: The main hanger of Doncaster Air Museum is a vast building and houses flying aircraft of every kind. Stuart ventures alone and soon realises something is there with him.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison 2 P1
programme.desc: Said to be the Most Haunted prison in the UK, HMP Dorchester is a scary place to be with a group of people but alone it becomes terrifying. Karl investigates the upper cells and gets more than he bargained for.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison 2 P2
programme.desc: Stuart enters the underbelly of this remarkable building and starts to witness some very strange occurrences.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt1
programme.desc: With paranormal activity of every kind, Dorchester Prison isn’t for the faint hearted. Karl takes on the prison block where aggressive phantoms and poltergeists are said to roam.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Prison Pt2
programme.desc: With Karl in the main prison block, Stuart checks out the isolation unit, with dramatic results.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Dorchester Shire Hall P1
programme.desc: Karl investigates the courtroom of one of Dorchester’s most historical buildings and is suddenly surrounded by unexplained occurrences.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Unexplained Phenomena
programme.desc: This week, TAPS takes a call from the American Legion in Pennsylvania where people are terrified by paranormals.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Time To Get Touched
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Ohio and to the Thurber house, the home of author James Thurber, whowrote The Night the Ghost Got In based off his paranormal experiences there.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Betsy Ross House
programme.desc: A family living in a Revolutionary War era house in Pennsylvania fears for their child and urgently calls on the TAPS team for help.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghostly Refuge
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Oswego, New York to investigate the renowned Fort Ontario. TAPS has investigated many forts, but never one that once served as a sanctuary for Jewish refugees during World War II.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.sub-title: Tunnel at the End of the Light
programme.desc: With fifty parties on board, Dylan hosts the signing of the New Commonwealth charter, but soon discovers there are intruders intent on stopping the signing.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Tyr are taken over by the energy from a dimensional tunnel. Dylan, Trance and Harper must save them before they destroy the ship.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Shards of Rimni
programme.desc: Dylan is framed for murder and must clear his name while finding the pieces of a vase said to grant the owner the "blessings of the cosmos.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Mad to Be Saved
programme.desc: The crew rescues a group of refugees, only to discover they have been subject to government experiments and are extremely unstable.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Cui Bono
programme.desc: Beka's uncle runs for office in the New Commonwealth, but an assassination attempt causes the crew to act as his security.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Lone and Level Sands
programme.desc: When the Andromeda is attacked by space pirates, they are rescued by a long-lost spaceship from Earth.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.66
programme.desc: A woman and her niece wage war over impound fees on a Chevy Trailblazer, the cost of college tuition, and $92 dollars allegedly ‘stolen’ by a raccoon.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.43
programme.desc: Teenager steals mother's checkbook, buys car; parents sue custom shop owner/Woman sues ex-lover for leaving her for mother of his child; he claims bitterness, she alleges owed money.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.13
programme.desc: A woman claims her ex-boyfriend asked her to pawn her jewelry to pay their bills; he says she offered to do it/A loan to pay DUI bills is disputed by ex-lovers, one of whom claims it was a birthday gift.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.122
programme.desc: Woman and niece sue niece's ex-friend over wrecked Jeep Commander/injured woman sues for nude photos posted online/woman sues estranged daughter-in-law for loan to recover repossessed car.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.58
programme.desc: Man and stepson suing ex-friend for iPod and necklace face weakened case due to internet slander. Woman demands ex-fiancé pay Home Depot card charges; he claims items used to fix her home.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.73
programme.desc: Teenager denies side-swiping mailbox, sues friend for car damage. Woman's arm broken during playful punch exchange with friend.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.29
programme.desc: Siblings dispute deceased grandmother's estate, personal property, and damages from alleged mutual assault/Woman sues ex-boyfriend for alleged life-threatening phone call over broken apartment lease, involving alleged marijuana and meth use.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.223
programme.desc: A woman accuses her ex-boyfriend of charging over $10,000 on her emergency credit card while she studied abroad in Germany. A man admits to stabbing an air mattress due to spilled beer, leading to a lawsuit by his girlfriend's ex-boyfriend for damages.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.207
programme.desc: Man regrets buying '95 Thunderbird, sued by fiancée's ex-friend. Another man claims god brother's estranged wife towed his car. Dog handler sues former customers over Chihuahua cost due to alleged gift card fraud.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.105
programme.desc: Ex-friends dispute over money after unauthorized shower photos and drug possession arrest/Woman sues ex-friend for unpaid BMW balance; friend claims she donated car before paying off.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.204
programme.desc: A man sues his ex-boyfriend for an unpaid loan he says he made for bail; he is countersued for alleged harassment.\t\t\t\r\nEx-lovers, who accuse each other of infidelity, fight over $3,000 in credit card bills.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams must pick a team leader for the next dinner service; a chef serves an undercooked dish; a contestant is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Contestants from each team must work in pairs and present a unique pizza dish to Ramsay; the losers clean up and prepare both kitchens for dinner service, while the winners go to a luxurious hotel; one team runs out of a crucial ingredient.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The team that prepares the most-impressive Southern-inspired menu for a sorority's anniversary party wins a trip to Las Vegas; both teams struggle with communication during dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants are given 30 minutes to create an entrée from surprise ingredients; Ramsay conducts one-on-one evaluations.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants visit one of Gordon Ramsay's restaurants; the teams prepare meals inspired by Ramsay's cuisine; the contestants face elimination.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Catherine Monson is the driving force behind Fastsigns which is America’s largest custom sign franchise company. During her journey, Catherine finds out it’s really the personal discoveries that make this experience a life-changing one.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Russell's Secret
programme.desc: Audrey discovers that Russell is a closeted fan of Broadway musicals, a fact she promises to keep secret in exchange for free theater tickets. Meanwhile, Adam and Jennifer take dancing lessons in preparation for their wedding.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Twice
programme.desc: When Audrey becomes jealous of a pregnant co-worker, she inadvertently convinces her colleagues that she has a bundle of joy on the way too.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Lyin' King
programme.desc: Things quickly get complicated when Audrey and Jeff decide to ditch a dinner date with Jennifer and Adam in order to attend Brad and Jackie's exclusive, celebrity packed party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Family Style
programme.desc: When Audrey plans a dinner date with Jeff, Jackie (Guest Star Sam Harris) and Brad (Guest Star Orlando Jones), Jeff feels extremely violated when Jackie begins eating off his plate!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Sex Toy Story
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Audrey throw a 'girls only' sex party, Jeff quickly gets insecure when he finds a 'product' Audrey may have purchased.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: House Money
programme.desc: When Jennifer and Russell decide to teach Adam a lesson in responsibility, the joke is on them when Adam has the last laugh.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: May Divorce Be With You
programme.desc: When Audrey invites her and Jeff's recently divorced out of luck friend Steve to stay with them for a few days, Audrey thinks she may have become Steve's newest rebound.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Poaching Timmy
programme.desc: When Timmy grows tired of dealing with Russell's demeaning demands and Audrey has had it with her terrible assistant, the two find a possible solution in working together. Meanwhile, Jeff tries to recreate the conditions that led to a Giants win.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old Timer's Day
programme.desc: Jeff tries to prove to Audrey he's young and spry and invites her to watch him play softball. While up at bat, a simple sneeze throws his back out, but he insists on playing in the tournament game.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Challenge
programme.desc: When Jeff, Russell, and Adam make a bet to see who would be able to score the soonest, the three put their thinking caps on and rise up to the challenge.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting
programme.desc: On the advice of Russell, Jack's flirtation with a colleague at work reveals that she's more than happy to have an affair. Russell, realizing he left his phone at the home of a one-night stand, sends Timmy to find it.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bounty Baby
programme.desc: What's a father to do? When the cops ask Dog for help tracking down a renegade teen with a history of running hard, Baby Lyssa, eight months pregnant and counting, insists on joining the hunt. Can Dog keep his daughter safe and catch his man?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Picture This
programme.desc: A fugitive with a long criminal record has fled to Hawaii, and the bondsman on the mainland has asked Dog for help. Dog doesn't have much information to work with, but he can use the felon's desire to impress his friends to track him down.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Call Waiting
programme.desc: Dog's target for today has been in trouble with the law since he was a juvenile. And he seems willing to use any trick in the system to avoid capture by Dog. In this match of wits, will Dog prevail?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ties That Bind
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Does It
programme.desc: There is a running joke in the posse that every time Bobby Brown asks them for help with a fugitive, he always promises them it's "an easy one," but the hunts end up being epic searches.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Twisted Love
programme.desc: Dog is tracking down Cecilia, who's wanted for car theft, but she's nowhere to be found. Her girlfriend and co-signer has gone missing too. Just when the trail goes cold, a friend leads the team to the cosigner's empty apartment.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Menehune Mischief
programme.desc: When Beth returns to the compound on the Big Island she finds a damaged SUV and two possible culprits - Dog or Justin. Pressed by Beth, Dog offers a third option. The perpetrators are Hawaii's mythical mischief makers - the Menehune!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rock-a-Bye Bounty
programme.desc: Dog and Beth must go after their former housekeeper, Lisa, who's jumped bond. They know this case will be tricky because Lisa knows everyone in the family. Luckily, Beth's nephew, Jason, is visiting and is quickly put to work as the bait.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bait & Snitch
programme.desc: With the aid of the runner's girlfriend the posse heads out to bring a client with a checked past in. Little does the team suspect that before the end of the day Dog will be helping to mend a family torn apart by violence.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All Grown Up
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different than the all girls private school she attended.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack Draft
programme.desc: When the Robertsons participate in the West Monroe Fire Department pancake breakfast, the firemen invite Willie and his brothers to train with the department for the day. Meanwhile, Phil and Si accompany Miss Kay on a trip to visit a family grave.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Brand of Brothers
programme.desc: When Willie contemplates re-branding the Duck Commander image, Jase takes issue with having an outsider design their image, so he and the guys create their own new logo and business cards. Meanwhile, Willie and Phil help Bella with her science project.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: De-Bug Life
programme.desc: The guys realize it is time for the annual cleaning of the duck blinds when they come across a gator using one as a home. Meanwhile, while the kids are running the church car wash, Si and Willie disagree on the best way to draw in customers.(n)

programme.title: Meteor Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this End Times thriller, a gigantic meteor enters Earth's orbit and begins to disintegrate, showering the planet in poisonous debris.(n)

programme.title: Native
programme.desc: Two scientists are selected to travel across the universe to the source of a distant transmission and potential life.(n)

programme.title: Marjorie Prime
programme.desc: In 2050, 86-year-old Marjorie has a holographic companion who resembles her dead husband and is programmed to feed her the story of her life. With Lois Smith, Jon Hamm, Geena Davis.(n)

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: A comedy centered on three museum security guards who devise a plan to steal back the artworks to which they have become attached after they are transferred to another museum. Starring: Morgan Freeman, Christopher Walken, Joseph McKenna, Wynn Everett.(n)

programme.title: Foster
programme.desc: A heart-warming story of family and friendship starring Academy Award Nominee Toni Collette and Ioan Gruffudd.(n)

programme.title: Knucklehead
programme.desc: After incurring a large debt with a local criminal ringleader, Eddie Sullivan creates a get-rich-quick scheme and enlists a gentle giant named Walter as his unwitting accomplice.(n)

programme.title: Jack Hunter: And The Star of Heaven
programme.desc: Jack Hunter realizes the pharaoh's tomb being empty except for a Roman coin means the treasure was looted to Rome but later probably transferred the the new, Byzantine capital, Constantinople.(n)

programme.title: Dragon Warriors
programme.desc: An evil wizard, Lord Tensley, seeks the hand and heart of the beautiful princess. When she refuses, he locks her away and releases a deadly dragon to terrorize the land. Starring: James Marsters, Kaitlin Doubleday, Luke Perry.(n)

programme.title: Union Bound
programme.desc: Union Bound is a thrilling Civil War film that shows the strength and courage of the human spirit. Sergeant Joseph Hoover went to war to preserve the Union but finds himself captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Gift
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story. Ten-year-old Wesley puts together a "Secret Santa" gift for a needy child and when ten-year-old Megan opens the package, she discovers an item that will have a huge impact on her life to come.(n)

programme.title: This is Our Christmas
programme.desc: When a spoiled Beverly Hills teenager needs to be taught a lesson she is sent to the local ski-town, by her guardian angel mother to help save her aunt's failing bakery and learn the importance of helping others.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Christmas
programme.desc: A bitter and burned-out Ghost of Christmas Past decides to go AWOL.(n)

programme.title: Sound Of Christmas
programme.desc: Whilst trying to reignite his daughter’s passion for Christmas, Brad, falls in love with piano teacher, Lizzie. However, their romance is threatened by Brad’s business interests.(n)

programme.title: My Son Is Innocent
programme.desc: After a brutal nighttime rape, police investigators zero in on teenager Eric Sutter. When the victim identifies Eric as her attacker, the legal system closes in on the boy as friends, neighbors and the media turn against him.(n)

programme.title: Presumed Dead
programme.desc: An international crime novelist is the primary suspect in the disappearance of a young woman and it's up to Detective Mary Anne Cooper to piece together this bizarre missing person's case.(n)

programme.title: Secret Liaison
programme.desc: One time top public defender returns to LA to try to stop her sister from going to jail for first degree murder, but Samantha also comes face to face with the past she ran away from.(n)

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: A heroic squire (Stephen Moyer) protects a princess (Katherine Heigl) and tries to retrieve the sword Excalibur from Viking raiders.(n)

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: On Luce Price's first day at the Sword & Cross boarding school, her attention is captured by the strangely familiar Daniel Grigori. She soon discovers he is a fallen angel who has battled over her for centuries.(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: A boy (Josh Hutcherson) and his new friend (AnnaSophia Robb), the class outsider, create an imaginary world in which they rule as king and queen.(n)

programme.title: Prince Valiant
programme.desc: A heroic squire (Stephen Moyer) protects a princess (Katherine Heigl) and tries to retrieve the sword Excalibur from Viking raiders.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark Twain visits North Fork and quickly alienates the townspeople.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to stop embittered John Holliver from venting his wrath on the people who expelled him from town years before.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas becomes the target of a vengeful mountaineer after he is responsible for a young mountain boy's death.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark is kidnapped and held for ransom, he finds himself an unwilling companion of gunman Carl Avery.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas seeks an escape when he's captured by outlaws while seeking help for an injured Mark.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: The young Queen-to-be of France hides out in North Fork with her sick brother.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A notorious killer is being held in the North Fork jail. When word gets around that Gordo's gang is on its way to free him, the whole town becomes frightened.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas's old Army pal settles in North Fork with his deaf daughter.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An Englishman arrives with a custom-made rifle and a plan to kill Lucas.(n)

programme.title: The Mighty Macs
programme.desc: In the early 70s, Cathy Rush becomes the head basketball coach at a tiny, all-girls Catholic college. Though her team has no gym and no uniforms Coach Rush looks to steer her girls to their first national championship.(n)

programme.title: Ice Girls
programme.desc: A 15-year-old figure skating champion leaves the sport after her mother loses her job and the family moves to a small town. She struggles to fit in until the owner of a local skating arena helps her fulfill her true potential.(n)

programme.title: The Chaperone
programme.desc: Ray’s been asked to chaperone a school trip with his daughter Sally’s class. When characters from Ray’s criminal past believe he stole the loot from a bank they robbed, Ray will do whatever it takes to keep his daughter and her class out of harms way.(n)

programme.title: K9 Legend Of The Lost Gold
programme.desc: When Kassie and her friends stumble across an old, broken pocket watch they begin an unexpected journey to unlock the secret of the legendary Garrison Gold. They'll have to solve clues to find the lost treasure.(n)

programme.title: My Bakery in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Two cousins, two kinds of thinking, and a bakery for saving.(n)

programme.title: Grind
programme.desc: Four young men embark on a road trip from Chicago to Oceanside, CA, following the summer tour of a skateboard star. Starring Adam Brody ("Shazam!").(n)

programme.title: Employee of the Month
programme.desc: Shocking twists follow after bank manager David Walsh is fired, dumped by his fiancée and shot in the span of a day. Starring : Matt Dillon, Steve Zahn, Christina Applegate. (Comedy/Drama).(n)

programme.title: Landfall
programme.desc: At Coastal Command in Southern England, an RAF pilot is suspended after possibly sinking a British sub.(n)

programme.title: The Secret Place
programme.desc: A beautiful redhead becomes involved with a small-time gang of hoodlums who plan and perform a daring diamond robbery.(n)

programme.title: Smash and Grab
programme.desc: John Forrest, a private detective with a passion for model railways, accepts a job from an insurance firm to locate a gang of jewel thieves. As his investigation takes him to Ireland, he relies on his wife's assistance to solve the case.(n)

programme.title: That Hamilton Woman
programme.desc: The ill-fated romance of Horatio Lord Nelson and Emma Hamilton, wife of the British Ambassador to Naples. Made during WWII, the film was clearly meant to raise the morale of British audiences and was said to have been Churchill's favourite film.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) jumps into the life of a ``ghostbuster'' who has been asked to silence the other-world murmurings of a dead romance novelist. Deborah Pratt guest stars. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) assumes the identity of a newlywed New York policeman who is pursued by his bride's jealous ex-husband. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam Beckett remembers his own relationship with his older brother when Sam becomes a stuntman who must protect his younger brother from being killed while doing a stunt on a low-budget feature.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a Pacific sailor returning from duty in 1953 with a Japanese war bride (Leila Hee Olsen) -- much to the dismay of his friends and family. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a blind concert pianist in 1964 who must prevent the death of a young woman. Also stars Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Heir and the Spare (REDUX)
programme.desc: The crew arrest a con-man preying on older women. But the prisoner has a dark secret and a genetic link to Marcus. Meanwhile, Percy's secret parallel search for Dante begins to wear on her; we fear for the consequences to her health and judgement.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: M.I.A.
programme.desc: Sydney gets kidnapped, but by whom? Nigel, Claudia and Cate will have to go through the list of enemies Sydney has made in the past and deduce which of them is responsible. Cue flashbacks.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Don't Go Into the Woods
programme.desc: Sydney's friend phones to inform her that he's discovered information on the Golden Hawk of Maribor, lost since 1711. Sydney and Nigel travel to Lubjanka to meet him, but he's already gone.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: French Connection
programme.desc: While on a lecture tour with Nigel in Europe, Sydney is contacted by MI5 because she is the only one who can prevent an impending high-level assassination.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Midnight Flight
programme.desc: Germania, ca. 400 AD: an artifact called Gunther's Scepter is sealed in a vault. Kleine Burgh, 2001: Sydney and Nigel are hired to find it using a crystal and a stone tablet.(n)

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Executioner's Mask
programme.desc: When a model's face is disfigured after she puts on the mask of a French executioner, Sydney and Nigel will try and find the tomb to reverse the curse.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Mr. Haff Goes to Washington
programme.desc: Ton and Allen invade the Nation's capital, but meet strong resistance from local bidders. The guys uncover a Civil War era black powder revolver and a stash of South African gold coins!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Half Pipe Dreams
programme.desc: 1970s Z-Flex Jimmy Plumer Poolrider skateboard with artwork by Doug Smith; Kevlar bulletproof vest, ballistic facemask and a helmet used by S.W.A.T. teams; a pair of 1990s racing pocket bikes capable of going 80 mph.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Jersey Score
programme.desc: Ton & Allen attend a silent auction in NJ, but that doesn't stop the local buyers from letting them know they're not welcome! They uncover a skeet throwing machine from the 1960's & a vintage vehicle with some real horsepower!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Hot Commodity
programme.desc: Allen is late to the auction, leaving Ton to battle a feisty female auction buyer on his own! The guys find a fully functional flamethrower and a rare hand-carved bow and arrow set from South America!(n)
